contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{nihongo|'''Kamitakai'''|上高井郡|Kamitakai-gun}} is a [[districts of Japan|district]] located in [[Nagano Prefecture|Nagano]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the district has an estimated [[population]] of 19,073 and a [[population density|density]] of 162.23 persons per km². The total area is 117.57 km². ==Towns and villages== *[[Obuse, Nagano|Obuse]] *[[Takayama, Nagano|Takayama]] {{Nagano}} {{coord|36.666|N|138.412|E|type:landmark_source:itwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Districts in Nagano Prefecture]] {{Nagano-geo-stub}}
